genresAdvancedInfo.name: nz hardcore
genresAdvancedInfo.description: NZ Hardcore is a subgenre of punk rock that originated in New Zealand in the 1980s. It is characterized by its fast, aggressive sound and politically charged lyrics. The genre often features shouted vocals, distorted guitars, and driving rhythms. NZ Hardcore bands have been known for their DIY ethos and commitment to social justice causes. The genre has been influential
